0.smallLine: Fast. Secure. Reliable. — We move your time-critical shipments across the globe, 24/7.

1.smallLine: Our 24/7 Onboard Courier team ensures the fastest, safest, and most transparent hand-carry delivery from pickup to final handover.

2.smallLine: Your urgent shipment is personally escorted door-to-door, monitored in real time, and delivered exactly when you need it.

AboutSection.label: About Us
AboutSection.title: About OBC Care
AboutSection.subtitle: Your Global Partner in Time-Critical Logistics
AboutSection.p1: At OBC Care, we move what matters most: from production spare parts and AOG shipments to automotive components and electronic equipment.
AboutSection.p2: We're trusted by businesses worldwide to handle high-value, urgent shipments with precision, reliability, and full transparency.

0.title: Multi-Industry Logistics Solutions
0.description: We specialize in mission-critical deliveries for aircraft parts, industrial spares, electronics, fashion items, and sensitive documents worldwide.

1.title: Complete Door-to-Door Service
1.description: From pickup to handover, every stage is managed by our professional team with care and accuracy.

2.title: Global Reach, Local Expertise
2.description: With a worldwide network of trusted partners, we deliver seamlessly across continents and time zones.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: Stay informed at every milestone. Our OBC team keeps you updated in real time, from pick-up to final delivery.

LogisticsAdvantage.label: Our Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.title: Fast, Secure, and Global — Our Logistics Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.subtitle: Your deadlines drive us.
LogisticsAdvantage.p1: OBC Care provides end-to-end logistics solutions designed for industries that can’t afford delays: <bold>aviation, automotive, and electronics.</bold>
LogisticsAdvantage.p2: We coordinate first and last mile deliveries, onboard couriers, customs clearance, and next-flight-out (NFO) arrangements to ensure every shipment arrives when it's needed most.
LogisticsAdvantage.p3: Whether it's across the city or across the world, we move faster, think smarter, and deliver with care.

ServicesCTA.title: Need a Time-Critical Delivery?
ServicesCTA.description: Whether it’s an urgent aircraft part or a last-minute production component, we deliver with speed, precision, and full visibility, <bold>around the clock.</bold>
ServicesCTA.cardDescription: Priority handling, real-time updates, and dedicated experts for your most critical moves, <bold>anywhere in the world.</bold>

Footer.followText: Stay connected with us for logistics insights and updates:

ServicesBanner.title:
Delivering Precision-Driven
Logistics Solutions
ServicesBanner.description: For time-critical shipments across the globe — from AOG and automotive parts to electronics and industrial components.

header.label: Our Core Services
header.title:
Priority
Logistics Solutions
header.p1: At OBC Care, we understand that <bold>downtime costs money</bold>. That's why we provide priority logistics solutions tailored for industries that demand speed, security, and global reach.
header.p2: Our expertise ensures that every shipment — big or small — arrives <green>safely, swiftly, and seamlessly</green>.

0.title: First Mile / Last Mile (FM/LM) Delivery
0.description: Seamless pickup and delivery from origin to final destination.

1.title: Onboard Courier (OBC) Service
1.description: When every second counts, our professional couriers personally escort your shipment with utmost priority.

2.title: Customs Clearance Assistance
2.description: We simplify the complex. Our customs experts handle every detail of international customs coordination.

3.title: Next Flight Out (NFO) Solutions
3.description: When speed is everything, NFO ensures your shipment takes off on the next available flight.

header.label: How We Operate
header.title:
Efficient Process,
Transparent Results
header.p1: At OBC Care, <bold>every minute matters</bold>. That's why our process is designed to be efficient, transparent, and fully customized for your shipment's urgency, route, and industry.
header.p2: Here's how we make it happen:

0.title: Request & Assessment
0.description: Submit your shipment details — our operations team will evaluate the fastest route and provide a quote within 15 minutes.

1.title: Booking & Documentation
1.description: Once confirmed, we book all flights and prepare all necessary paperwork, including customs documentation, to ensure a smooth transport.

2.title: Collection & Handover
2.description: A trained courier picks up your shipment and prepares it for departure.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: From pickup to delivery, we send live status updates at every milestone.

4.title: Final Delivery Confirmation
4.description: Once your shipment arrives, you'll receive instant proof of delivery — safely and on time.

header.label: Flexible Delivery Options
header.title: Built for Every Route and Requirement
header.description: We tailor each transport solution to fit your operation's needs — whether it's time-critical, sensitive, or high-value cargo.

door-to-door.title: Door-to-Door
door-to-door.description: Complete pickup and delivery from sender to receiver — full convenience, zero hassle.

airport-to-airport.title: Airport-to-Airport
airport-to-airport.description: Ideal for international freight — coordination from origin to destination airports efficiently.

door-to-airport.title: Door-to-Airport
door-to-airport.description: Perfect for shippers sending goods abroad — we handle local pickup, packaging, and airline dispatch.

airport-to-door.title: Airport-to-Door
airport-to-door.description: We take over once your shipment lands — handling customs and fast last-mile delivery to your receiver.

header.label: How We Move Your Shipments
header.title: Fast. Secure. Global.
header.description: Every delivery is different — that’s why we customize our logistics approach for efficiency and precision.

air.title: Air Transport (Onboard & Cargo Flights)
air.description: Our couriers travel with or coordinate your shipment via the fastest route available, ensuring priority handling and zero delays.

ground.title: Ground Transport
ground.description: For short or regional routes, we provide direct, door-to-door ground delivery with GPS tracking and standby drivers for continuous movement.

items.1: Secure handling and custody at every transfer point
items.2: Verified couriers and partner checks for full accountability

ShipmentMethods.imageCaption: OBC missions, FM/LM or NFO in action — priority handling worldwide.

ObcBanner.title: From airport to doorstep — hand‑carried, monitored, and delivered with care.
ObcBanner.description: We move your most time‑critical, high‑value shipments with priority handling and full visibility — 24/7, worldwide.

ObcWhatIs.badge: What Is an Onboard Courier Service?
ObcWhatIs.title: Fastest and most secure way to move urgent shipments worldwide
ObcWhatIs.p1: An Onboard Courier (OBC) service is the fastest and most secure way to move urgent shipments across the globe.
ObcWhatIs.p2: A professional courier personally carries your shipment as hand luggage on a commercial flight, ensuring it is never left unattended or delayed in cargo.
ObcWhatIs.p3: This hand‑carry method is used for time‑critical, high‑value, or sensitive shipments, guaranteeing priority handling, direct supervision, and the shortest possible delivery time.

ObcWhyImportant.title: When every minute counts
ObcWhyImportant.description: OBC services keep operations running in aviation, automotive, tech, and manufacturing by eliminating delays and maintaining custody at every step.

0.title: Zero Room for Error
0.description: Avoid misrouting, loss, or delays common in standard air cargo with hand-carry supervision.

1.title: Immediate Availability
1.description: Your shipment moves on the next available flight — not in days.

2.title: Continuous Control
2.description: Courier handles customs, security, and delivery personally — no third‑party handovers.

3.title: Peace of Mind
3.description: Live status updates ensure full visibility from pickup to final handover.

4.title: Critical for Urgent Industries
4.description: Ideal for AOG parts, prototypes, sensitive items, and confidential documents.

ObcWhyChoose.title: Precision‑driven hand‑carry logistics
ObcWhyChoose.description: A distinct operating model that pairs rapid mobilization with continuous custody.

stats.title: Built for Critical Missions
stats.subtitle: Hand‑carry operations with auditable custody and proactive exception handling.

0.title: Speed You Can Rely On
0.description: Next available flight — no cargo wait or consolidation delays.

1.title: Maximum Security
1.description: Continuous custody from check‑in to customs to handover.

2.title: Real‑Time Updates
2.description: Live notifications for flight status and delivery confirmation.

3.title: Global Coverage
3.description: Rapid mobilization across Europe, Asia, Middle East, North America.

ObcIndustries.title: Built for operations that can’t afford downtime
ObcIndustries.description: A distinctive mosaic layout highlighting impact across verticals.

ObcNetwork.description: With trained couriers stationed across major hubs, we dispatch the nearest OBC within minutes — ensuring priority handling and continuous custody.

ObcJoin.title: Become an On Board Courier
ObcJoin.description1: Join a global network of professional couriers who deliver critical shipments with precision and care. Be part of missions that matter — from urgent medical supplies to time-sensitive industrial parts.
ObcJoin.description2: At OBC Care, we value reliability, professionalism, and a commitment to excellence. If you're ready to make a difference while traveling the world, we want to hear from you.
ObcJoin.cta: Start your journey with OBC Care today

ObcCta.title: Your Urgent Shipment, Our Immediate Priority
ObcCta.description: With 1,200+ professional couriers across 70 countries, we ensure your time-critical shipments receive the attention they deserve. From inquiry to delivery, we're with you every step of the way.

FmlmBanner.title: Bridging every mile — from pickup to delivery, with no delays.
FmlmBanner.description: Seamless ground transport connecting airports, warehouses, and destinations with speed, precision, and 24/7 availability — worldwide.

FmlmWhatIs.badge: What Is First Mile / Last Mile Delivery?
FmlmWhatIs.title: Every shipment begins with a first mile and ends with a last mile — and both are critical.

firstMile.title: First Mile Delivery
firstMile.description: Transporting goods from the shipper's location (like a warehouse or supplier) to the next logistics point — often the airport or freight forwarder.

lastMile.title: Last Mile Delivery
lastMile.description: The final stretch, moving shipments from the airport, customs warehouse, or terminal directly to the consignee's doorstep.

FmlmWhatIs.description: At OBC Care, we ensure both ends of the journey are handled with speed, precision, and care — connecting your cargo from origin to destination seamlessly.

FmlmWhyImportant.badge: Why Is First & Last Mile Delivery Important?
FmlmWhyImportant.title: Even the fastest flight is only as efficient as the ground transport that supports it.
FmlmWhyImportant.description: Delays, mishandling, or poor coordination during the first or last mile can jeopardize entire operations, especially in time-critical industries.

0.title: Prevents Costly Delays
0.description: Proper timing ensures your shipment catches the next flight or reaches your client on time.

1.title: Ensures Shipment Integrity
1.description: Secure ground handling minimizes damage, loss, or misrouting.

2.title: Bridges Global Gaps
2.description: FM/LM services connect airports, warehouses, and destinations in one smooth flow.

3.title: Supports 24/7 Operations
3.description: Perfect for urgent AOG, automotive, or electronic shipments that can't wait.

4.title: Guarantees Accountability
4.description: Every handover and movement is tracked and reported.

FmlmSolutions.title: We understand that time is everything.
FmlmSolutions.description: That's why OBC Care's First Mile / Last Mile Delivery is designed for efficiency, visibility, and reliability — from pickup to delivery.

builtForSpeed.title: Built for Speed & Reliability
builtForSpeed.subtitle: Ground transport operations with real-time tracking and proactive coordination.

FmlmNetwork.title: Global Ground Coordination at Your Fingertips
FmlmNetwork.description1: With hundreds of professional drivers and logistics partners across Asia, Europe, and the Americas, OBC Care guarantees seamless global ground coordination.
FmlmNetwork.description2: Whether it's door-to-door, airport-to-door, door-to-airport, or airport-to-airport, our FM/LM network is built to move your cargo efficiently — anytime, anywhere.

FmlmJoin.title: Become a First & Last Mile Driver
FmlmJoin.description1: Want to join our fast-moving logistics team? Every mile you drive makes a difference — ensuring critical shipments reach their destinations on time.
FmlmJoin.description2: As part of OBC Care's global network, you'll be trusted with high-value and time-sensitive deliveries, backed by our 24/7 support team.
FmlmJoin.description3: Whether you're an experienced courier or a professional driver looking to enter time-critical logistics, we're always looking for reliable partners worldwide to grow our network.

FmlmCta.title: Your Shipment, Moved with Precision
FmlmCta.description: From the first pickup to the last handover, OBC Care ensures your shipment never loses momentum. We deliver speed, accuracy, and accountability — so your operations run smoothly without interruption.
FmlmCta.closing: Let's move your shipment — faster, safer, and smarter.
